hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read file_path; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then cd backend && uv run ruff format "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; uv run ruff check --fix "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; fi; if echo "$file_path" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then cd frontend && pnpm prettier --write "$file_path" 2>/dev/null; fi; }

[ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"decision": "block", "reason": "Cannot edit on main branch. Create a work package branch first: git checkout -b wp<N>/<description>"}' && exit 2; }
